channel.title: Is there and will there be a flash cup?
channel.description: is there and will there be a flash cup?

item.title: Is there and will there be a flash cup?
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

[quote=“Criptic, post:7, topic:83861”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=123214.msg1206408#msg1206408 date=1177378960]
If someone is really good at flash they could either be awarded with the graphics or the web developer cup, depending on what they use flash for. Therefore there does not have to be a seperate flash cup.
[/quote]
kk but what about game making?[/quote]
that is starting to get off topic there, But I think you would get a programming cup instead of a gaming cup.
I like flash though, but I agree, there isn’t that much popularity for one.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there and will there be a flash cup?

item.title: Is there and will there be a flash cup?
item.dc:creator: @Criptic Criptic
item.description:
@Criptic wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:4, topic:83861”]I don’t think people who will get the award should suggest it

Although, I have never seen any of your Flash work, so you could be rubbish and thinking your good.[/quote]
i was just asking if there was one and or if there will be one made because well there is one for allmost everthing else on this forum
